sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
This is the dyalogus or co[m]munyng betwxt [sic] the wyse king Salomon and Marcolphus Salomon et Marcolphus. English.
[36] p. : ill. (woodcut)
By me M. Gerard leeu], [Emprentyd at andewerpe : [1492]
A translation of a version of "Salomon et Marcolphus", a text of Gnostic origin. A different version from STC 22899. Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date from STC. Signatures: [a]-b⁴ c⁶ d⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

By me M. Gerard leeu], [Emprentyd at andewerpe : [1492]
A translation of a version of "Salomon et Marcolphus", a text of Gnostic origin. A different version from STC 22899. Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date from STC. Signatures: [a]-b⁴ c⁶ d⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
me M. Gerard leeu]
